definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: She egged her husband on to save up some money and start his own business.
sentences.chinese: 她撺掇其丈夫攒钱自己开店做生意。

sentences.english: A few who run shops have turned their storefronts into missing person displays.
sentences.chinese: 有些开店的人干脆把门面改成了失踪人口展览。

sentences.english: You have to renew the contract to continue own the shop.
sentences.chinese: 你需要在租期到期之前续租以继续开店。

sentences.english: Because I had no thought of opening, and do the jade to appraise the.
sentences.chinese: 因为我刚开店，并没有想到要做玉石的鉴定书。

sentences.english: The man it is rural registered permanent residence, single into the city, not wealthy but able set.
sentences.chinese: 男方当初是农村户口，单身进城开店，不富裕但能干。

sentences.english: On my return, I scouted round to find a good location to set up my shop.
sentences.chinese: 回来后，我踅摸了一圈，找到了一个开店的好地方。

sentences.english: So far, McDonald has opened a total of 1065 chain stores in China .
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，麦当劳中国的开店总数达1065家。

sentences.english: The other day, some home furnishing clothing brand, in the new shop at.
sentences.chinese: 前些日子，某些家居服品牌，在新开店时。

sentences.english: Up to now, there are 1065 stores in total in China.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，麦当劳中国的开店总数达1065家。

sentences.english: Shakarian met the growing demand by opening stores in other states.
sentences.chinese: 沙克瑞恩通过在其它地区开店来满足日益增长的需求。

sentences.english: But their relationship ended after she moved to run a shop in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，后来因佩雷兹要到巴黎开店而中断了关系。

sentences.english: Today, a total of 1065 McDonald's restaurants are found in China.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，麦当劳中国的开店总数达1065家。

sentences.english: So far, McDonald has opened its chain stores in China with a total number of 1065 .
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，麦当劳中国的开店总数达1065家。

sentences.english: "I don't blame these private operators at all, " Yu says from his shop in Hong Kong's Hum Hong district.
sentences.chinese: “我对这些人没意见，”在香港红磡开店的于先生说。

sentences.english: The U. S. clothing company has yet to open a China store.
sentences.chinese: 美国阿博菲奇服装公司至今还未在中国授权开店。
